name: Macchiato Monsters Spell Cost Reference
description:
A quick reference sheet flow chart to help decide HP costs for spells in Macchiato Monsters.

Also includes a bunch of worked out examples spells, so you can see how the process works in practice.

Macchiato Monsters is a brilliant little rules light OSR game that uses its own take on the open ended magic system from the Whitehack. Being so open ended, I found it a bit tricky to run at the table, so I made this reference for myself to use. Hopefully useful to other people as well.

Details:

  • One page spell cost flowchart
  • 9 example spell templates (within 4 spells)
  • Detailed breakdowns of each spell's cost, along with potential modifications
